newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Hock Hua Bank in bonus, rights issues.
newsitem.headline: Hock Hua Bank in bonus, rights issues.

text.p: Malaysia's Hock Hua Bank Bhd said on Thursday it planned to make a bonus issue of 263 million new shares, and a rights issue of 131.5 million new shares.

Hock Hua said the proposed bonus issue would be on the basis of two new shares for every one existing share held. The proposed rights issue would be priced at 2.25 ringgit per share, and would be on a one-for-one basis.
The bank also said it planned to raise its authorised share capital to two billion shares from 200 million shares currently.

The rights issue is estimated to bring in 295.84 million ringgit. Hock Hua said 291.64 million ringgit would be used as working capital for Hock Hua and its subsidiaries, while 4.2 million ringgit would be the estimated expenses of the proposals.
